flashcard.question: What is the capital of France?
Syncretism
flashcard.answer: Combining and mixing of different religions, beliefs and thoughts ex: Greek and Roman cultures are mixed during the Hellenistic Period with Roman gods being copies of the Greek Gods and Latin being based on Greek

flashcard.question: Republic
flashcard.answer: - "res publica" or public affairs - form of government in which state is ruled by representatives of the elected body

flashcard.question: Roman Senate
flashcard.answer: - A council whose members were rich patricians - Originally an advisory body to the early kings, in the era of the Roman Republic the Senate effectively governed the Roman state and the growing empire - Led by two consuls that served for a year

flashcard.question: Roman Consul
flashcard.answer: - Roman rulers with equal powers who each ruled for a year - could veto each other
